data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Takhar with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Takhar, Afghanistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Takhar, Afghanistan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Spirit, reveal best practices for sharing the gospel in the state of Takhar.
Father, help the 174 believers in Takhar to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Parachi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, encourage the church of Takhar, Afghanistan that they are blessed with every heavenly blessing.
data.verse: Blessed be the God and Father of our Lord Jesus Christ, who has blessed us with every spiritual blessing in the heavenly places in Christ

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,092,892 lost people in  Takhar, Afghanistan have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Takhar to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Takhar
location.cities_list: Taloqan, Rustāq, Ārt Khwājah, Farkhār, Yangī Qal‘ah
location.cities_list_w_pop: Taloqan (64,256), Rustāq (25,636), Ārt Khwājah (18,623), Farkhār (10,480), Yangī Qal‘ah (6,541)
